docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

I like to and while eating my and after a long day at work

docs.title: Admonition
docs.text:
Example of an admonition/callout with a title:

Title of the callout

Collapsible callout

Admonition, collapsible and initially expanded

Note

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nulla et euismod nulla. Curabitur feugiat, tortor non consequat finibus, justo purus auctor massa, nec semper lorem quam in massa.

Inline blocks

Admonitions can also be rendered as inline blocks (e.g., for sidebars), placing them to the right using the inline + end modifiers, or to the left using only the inline modifier:

docs.title: Code examples
docs.text:
An example of a codeblock for python:

add_numbers.py
# Function to add two numbers
def add_two_numbers(num1, num2):
    return num1 + num2

# Example usage
result = add_two_numbers(5, 3)
print('The sum is:', result)

Example codeblock for JavaScript with lines highlighted:

code-examples.md
// Function to concatenate two strings
function concatenateStrings(str1, str2) {
  return str1 + str2;
}

// Example usage
const result = concatenateStrings("Hello, ", "World!");
console.log("The concatenated string is:", result);

docs.text:
Plain textUnordered listOrdered list

  • Second item

  2. Second item
  3. Third item

docs.title: Code Blocks in Content Tabs
Flowcharts
docs.text:
graph LR
  A[Start] --> B{Failure?};
  B -->|Yes| C[Investigate...];
  C --> D[Debug];
  D --> B;
  B ---->|No| E[Success!];

docs.title: Sequence Diagrams
docs.text:
sequenceDiagram
  autonumber
  Server->>Terminal: Send request
  loop Health
      Terminal->>Terminal: Check for health
  end
  Note right of Terminal: System online
  Terminal-->>Server: Everything is OK
  Terminal->>Database: Request customer data
  Database-->>Terminal: Customer data

docs.title: Class Diagrams
docs.text:
classDiagram
  Person <|-- Student
  Person <|-- Professor
  Person : +String name
  Person : +String phoneNumber
  Person : +String emailAddress
  Person: +purchaseParkingPass()
  Address "1" <-- "0..1" Person:lives at
  class Student{
    +int studentNumber
    +int averageMark
    +isEligibleToEnrol()
    +getSeminarsTaken()
  }
  class Professor{
    +int salary
  }
  class Address{
    +String street
    +String city
    +String state
    +int postalCode
    +String country
    -validate()
    +outputAsLabel()  
  }
